name: Block Fun - Crazy Blox World
description:
Play one of the most fun match-3 games ever! It is an exceptional time killer that will make you forget the meaning of the world boredom.
To score points, tap on the screen where at least 3 same looking blocks are. Try to reach the required amount of points in the given time, to unlock the next level.

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ Match 3 or more identical blocks
✔ Colorful graphics and smooth animations
✔ Cool sounds and music
✔ tons of levels to play
✔ Maximum points reachable with one move: 500
✔ Combos with multiplier factors
In order to get a combo you need to match up at least 3 blocks and then repeat the same action:
3 x 3 x 3 x….. 4 x 4 x 4 x…... 5 x 5 x 5 x …..etc.

Useful advice: You need to match at least 3 blocks to get points, if you touch just 2 of them they will disappear and empty the space they occupied before, but without giving you any points.

Warning: If you touch in a place where no matching freaks are, you will lose 50 points.
You will find yourself hopelessly addicted to this colorful fun cartoon freaks.
